tit.cmt: データベースには指月城→Shigetsu-jo Castleで登録がありましたが、原文では、しづきじょうの方が先行しており、こちらの方がより適切と考えたｔため、Shizuki-jo Castle と訳しています。

sen.j: 指月城は日本の城である。
sen.e: Shizuki-jo Castle is a Japanese castle.
Shizuki-jo Castle is a Japanese castle.
Shizuki-jo Castle is a Japanese castle.

sen.j: 指月城（しづきじょう・しげつじょう）は京都市伏見区にあった指月山伏見城のこと。
sen.e: Shizuki-jo Castle (also called Shigetsu-jo Castle) is Shizuki-san (mountain) Fushimi-jo Castle that was in Fishimi Ward, Kyoto City.
Shizuki-jo Castle (also called Shigetsu-jo Castle) is Shizuki-san (mountain) Fushimi-jo Castle, which was in Fishimi Ward, Kyoto City.
Shizuki-jo Castle (also called Shigetsu-jo Castle) is Shizuki-san (mountain) Fushimi-jo Castle, which was in Fushimi Ward, Kyoto City.

sen.j: 指月城（しづきじょう）は山口県萩市にあった萩城の別名。
sen.e: Shizuki-jo Castle is another name of Hagi-jo Castle that was in Hagi City, Yamaguchi Prefecture.
Shizuki-jo Castle is another name for Hagi-jo Castle, which was in Hagi City, Yamaguchi Prefecture.
Shizuki-jo Castle is another name for Hagi-jo Castle, which was in Hagi City, Yamaguchi Prefecture.
